node.name: iSpectrum
node.shortdescription:
Turn your Eclipse in a Java iPhone application development environment. Fully Develop and Debug iPhone application in your Eclipse.

  1. Create a Java project and activates iSpectrum for this project.
  2. Write your code in the latest Java programming language with iPhone APIs
    • Java Programming Language with generics, enum, (un)boxing, …
    • Core APIs based principally on Android: java.lang, java.util, java.net, java.io, java.nio, java.math, java.text
    • Full automatic Java garbage collector
  3. In one click, execute or debug your application on iPhone simulator or device.
    • Java code is compiled in Objective-C code, which is compiled in native code with Apple iPhone SDK
    • Near native performance
    • Compiling, signing and distributing compliant with Apple

Request a trial key now on http://www.flexycore.com. In January 2010, we will offer free ($0) license key for Open Source project.

Note: If you want to compile and obtain an iPhone binary application or an iPhone simulator binary application, you must have installed the iPhone SDK on a MAC OS X on x86 only and use FlexyCore iSpectrum on this system.
node.body:
Turn your Eclipse in a Java iPhone application development environment. Fully Develop and Debug iPhone application in your Eclipse.

  1. Create a Java project and activates iSpectrum for this project.
  2. Write your code in the latest Java programming language with iPhone APIs
    • Java Programming Language with generics, enum, (un)boxing, …
    • Core APIs based principally on Android: java.lang, java.util, java.net, java.io, java.nio, java.math, java.text
    • Full automatic Java garbage collector
  3. In one click, execute or debug your application on iPhone simulator or device.
    • Java code is compiled in Objective-C code, which is compiled in native code with Apple iPhone SDK
    • Near native performance
    • Compiling, signing and distributing compliant with Apple

Request a trial key now on http://www.flexycore.com. In January 2010, we will offer free ($0) license key for Open Source project.

Note: If you want to compile and obtain an iPhone binary application or an iPhone simulator binary application, you must have installed the iPhone SDK on a MAC OS X on x86 only and use FlexyCore iSpectrum on this system.
